comments: Gabriel was very approachable and always willing to help with any questions I had.
His explanations were clear and concise, making it easy to understand the material.
I appreciated the way he encouraged participation and made the tutorials interactive.
Gabriel's enthusiasm for biology was infectious and made the class enjoyable.
He provided constructive feedback on assignments that helped me improve my understanding.
Excellent at explaining complex concepts and making difficult topics accessible to everyone in the class.
Very helpful during office hours. Gabriel always made time to answer my questions and genuinely cared about my learning.
Made evolution interesting and approachable, even for students without a strong biology background.
I appreciated how Gabriel connected evolutionary concepts to real-world examples and current research.
The tutorials were engaging and interactive - much better than just lecturing at us.
Always provides thoughtful feedback that helped me improve my understanding and writing.
Great at fostering discussions where everyone felt comfortable participating.
Very knowledgeable and passionate about evolutionary biology - it was contagious!
One of the most approachable TAs I've had at UBC. Always willing to help and never made me feel like my questions were silly.
I learned so much in Gabriel's tutorials. The way he explained concepts made difficult ideas click for me.
Makes complex genetic concepts easy to understand by breaking them down into manageable parts.
Very patient with questions, never rushed through explanations even when lab time was running short.
Excellent lab demonstrations that made procedures clear and less intimidating.
Gabriel has a talent for explaining difficult concepts in ways that actually make sense.
I appreciated how he connected what we were learning in lab to the broader course material and real research.
